attributes.action: Euromillions lottery, change from £150m jackpot to a more reasonable 30 times £5m
attributes.additional_details: It seems wholly unreasonable to award a single Euromillions jackpot of £150 million, why not break this amount down to, perhaps, one prize of £10 million and multiple prizes of £5 million, or multiple millionaire raffles. They would surely sell just as many tickets if people felt that they had an increased chance of winning. It would then benefit a wider proportion of society.
